summary: Add std:: includes to your file according to what you have used.
name: std-includes
description:
Add c++ std includes to your c++ file.

execute
:StdIncludes
to add includes.

Your code should use std:: explicitly.

Screen shots:
http://www.railmoon.com/vim-std-includes/vim-std-includes

Please email me problems or suggestions.
install_details: put to your vim plugin dir ( ~/.vim/plugin for nix like systems )

versions.release_notes: Less empty lines when perform :StdIncludes without any header.
